thread.title: PPP leader Sharjeel Memon taken into custody from Islamabad Airport
thread.title_full: PPP leader Sharjeel Memon taken into custody from Islamabad Airport

title: PPP leader Sharjeel Memon taken into custody from Islamabad Airport
text:
PPP leader Sharjeel Memon taken into custody from Islamabad Airport | NAB probes corruption charges on Sharjeel Memon 
ISLAMABAD: Senior Pakistan Peoples` Party leader Sharjeel Memon has been taken into custody at Islamabad Airport by National Accountability Bureau immediately after his arrival. 
According to details available with Geo News, the member Sindh assembly arrived in the country from Dubai in the wee hours of Sunday along with the provincial ministers and advisor; Mukesh Chawla, Imdad Pitafi, Fayyaz Ali Butt and Nawab Taimur Talpur. 
According to sources privy to the development, at least six plain-cloth personnel under National Accountability Bureau`s deputy director of crime wing took Memon into his custody from the airport immediately when he came outside from the flight EK 614 which arrived at Benazir International Airport. 
The sources further informed that the personnel have shifted Memon to an undisclosed location for interrogation. Speaking to Geo News, Minister Imdad Ali Pitafi informed that Memon on the occasion resisted his arrest which led to brief manhandling, further adding that the former minister had bail before arrest from Islamabad High Court and was scheduled to appear before it on Monday. 
Speaking to Geo News, Advisor to CM Sindh Nawab Taimur Talpur informed that Memon on the occasion resisted his arrest which led to brief manhandling, further adding that the former minister had bail before arrest from Islamabad High Court and was scheduled to appear before it on Monday. 
Talpur said that "Chaudhry Nisar`s Gullu Butt ripped apart the copies of legal documents," further adding," Memon was taken away in a very disgraceful manner." 
Islamabad High Court has granted bail before arrest to Sharjeel Memon till March 20. 
National Accountability Bureau (NAB) has filed a reference against Pakistan People’s Party leader and former provincial minister Sharjeel Memon and 10 others in an accountability court of Karachi for the alleged commission of corruption of around Rs5.76billion. 
Besides Sharjeel, other accused include Zulfiqar Ali Shallwani, Aneeta Baloch, Mansoor Ahmed Rajput, Mohammad Yousuf Kaboro, Inaam Akbar, Altaf Hussain Memon, Riyaz Manir, Fazal Mehmood, Mohammad Hanif, Asim, Masood Hashmi, Gulzar Ali, Suleman Mansoor Umer, Syed Naveed and Sarang Latif Chandio. 
0 0 PPP leader Sharjeel Memon taken into custody from Islamabad Airport was posted in pakistan of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on March 19, 2017 and was last updated on March 19, 2017. This news story is related to Geo, Geo News, Pakistan, Pakistan News, Sharjeel Memon, Sindh, Sindh Assembly. Permanent link to the news story "PPP leader Sharjeel Memon taken into custody from Islamabad Airport" is https://www.geo.tv/latest/134798-PPP-leader-Sharjeel-Memon-taken-into-custody-from-Islamabad-Airport+geo%2FGiKR+%28Geo+Pakistan+-+Geo+TV+Network%29 .
